definition: car window/window of vehicle (bus, train etc)
car/vehicle/CL:輛|辆[liang4]/machine/to shape with a lathe/Kangxi radical 159

sentences.english: "I love the West, " she said. Her eyes were shining softly. She looked away and out the train window.
sentences.chinese: 她說，兩眼流露着柔柔的光，撇過頭望車窗的外面。

sentences.english: I couldn’t resist rolling down the window. As soon as I did, I heard waves crashing along the shoreline.
sentences.chinese: 我忍不住搖下車窗，立即聽到了波濤沖刷海岸的聲音。

sentences.english: Fuck the squeegee men dirtying up the clean windshield of my car.
sentences.chinese: 該死的那個弄髒我車窗的流浪漢。

sentences.english: I decorated the van windows with colorful little lights.
sentences.chinese: 我用五顏六色的小燈裝飾車窗。

sentences.english: My window was up, " he assured me.
sentences.chinese: 車窗是關上的，”他向我保證到。

sentences.english: and I thought that was funny so I rolled down my window and gave him a dollar.
sentences.chinese: 我覺得很有趣，就搖下車窗，給了他一美元。

sentences.english: Windows and wheels, and smoke, we can use our pencil to draw them on.
sentences.chinese: 車窗和車軲轆，還有煙，我們用筆畫上這些。

sentences.english: Out the left-side window, the fields were a vivid green.
sentences.chinese: 從左邊車窗望出去，田野鬱鬱蔥蔥。

sentences.english: A few sprinkles on the window began to indicate that it was raining.
sentences.chinese: 車窗上開始有幾滴水珠，表明下雨了。

sentences.english: Mahone smashes the car window with the pipe and he escapes from Wheeler and Lang. They pursue him and Lang catches Mahone at gunpoint.
sentences.chinese: 馬宏用鐵管打碎了車窗，從車裏跳出逃走。

sentences.english: Only the children are flattening their noses against the window-panes.
sentences.chinese: 只有小孩子纔會把鼻子緊貼在車窗上。

sentences.english: Forty-five minutes later, a window rolled down and a hand waved us back.
sentences.chinese: 四十五分鐘後，車窗搖了下來，一隻手向我們揮動。

sentences.english: This is especially useful for car windows which can get tough buildups of gunk.
sentences.chinese: 這對經常受頑固油膩物積累影響的車窗特別有用。

sentences.english: My father rolled down his window.
"Does he expect me to shoot passengers through the car windows?
sentences.chinese: “難道他還想讓我開槍射擊車窗裏的乘客嗎？”

sentences.english: She rolled down her window and asked me what had happened.
sentences.chinese: 她搖下車窗問我出了什麼事。

definition: car door/door of bus, railway carriage etc
to cause damage to/to ruin/to destroy
to close (a door)/to turn off (light, electrical equipment etc)
to open fire/to shoot a gun
